File_Description: File-level metadata associated with dataset. This file is an updated version (version 4) of the file-level metadata file.
Data dictionary defining column headers and other terms across the dataset. This file is an updated version (version 4) of the data dictionary file.
Microsoft word document for determination for Method Detection Limits (MDLs) for TDN and Ammonia data.
PDF document for determination for Method Detection Limits (MDLs) for TDN and Ammonia data.
Microsoft word document for detemination of Method Detection Limit for Ammonia and the interferences by LACHAT Flow Injection Analysis.
PDF document for detemination of Method Detection Limit for Ammonia and the interferences by LACHAT Flow Injection Analysis.

Location information for the sites containing data. This file contains both Location_IDs and the latitude and longitude measurements associated with the Location_IDs. Latitude and longitude measurements are in WGS84 format.
File containing mean values for ammonia concentrations in parts per million (ppm). Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.
File containing mean values for total dissolved nitrogen (TDN) in parts per million (ppm). Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.
